text: /JEL-\ @ High NA Lens Low NA Lens The resolutions Az and Az of the lens indicate how close two points at the focus can be and still be dis- tinguishable. The values are dependent on the numerical aper- ture (NA) and also the wavelength of light \: 0.64) Ar ~ —— ‘ NA 0.64 Ar =~ —— 7 NAP In practice, this is further limited by the pixel spac- ing in the CCD array and also the optics of the eye. Achievable values are in the range 2um to 15um.
